Headline: No trains between Clinton and the Loop
ShortDescription: UPDATE: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and the Loop due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
UPDATE: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clinton and the Loop due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 54th/Cermak and Clinton at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available between Polk and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Armitage and the Loop

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Headline: No Trains in the Loop
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Cermak and  due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green  Line service has been temporarily suspended in the Loop due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Ashland/Cottage Grove and 35th, and,
  • between Harlem and Ashland/Lake, only.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
